title: Trump rejects deal to stop government shutdown
shortDescription: Donald Trump and JD Vance rejected a bipartisan deal to prevent a government shutdown as thousands of federal workers face furlough.

title: Trump rejects plan to avoid government shutdown, sets up debt ceiling fight
shortDescription: The president-elect and his allies have come out against the newly proposed government funding bill just days before a serious shutdown could begin.

title: Congress' funding deal would boost disaster relief, help deepfake porn victims
shortDescription: From criminalizing deepfake porn to giving themselves a raise, lawmakers included a wide range of extra provisions in a funding bill released Tuesday.

title: Musk, Ramaswamy want Congress to reject deal that would prevent government shutdown
shortDescription: If Congress doesn't pass a funding plan by the end of the week, there will be a government shutdown.

title: Republican Rep. says she won't join GOP Conference, supports for DOGE
shortDescription: Rep. Victoria Spartz will not participate in Republican committees in the upcoming session. She wants to work with Elon Musk on DOGE.

title: Accused attempted Trump assassination suspect gets new Martin County charge
shortDescription: Florida Attorney General Ashley Moody announced an attempted felony murder charge against Ryan Routh for the near-death of a 6-year-old girl.

title: What's next in Trump's New York hush money case?
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump lost a bid Monday to get his hush money conviction tossed out based on presidential immunity. Will he now be sentenced?

title: Congress dodges major government shutdown with bipartisan deal
shortDescription: If Congress can pass the bill before the end of the week, government funding will extend to March 14.

title: Moskowitz, a Democrat, shuts down talk of his joining Trump's team
shortDescription: Moskowitz has emerged as a leading voice for bipartisanship among Democrats. But he says he has no current intentions of leaving Congress.

title: RFK Jr.'s nomination sparks skepticism for Democrats and Republicans
shortDescription: From his stances on vaccines to industrial farming and abortion, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faces tough questions from senators.

title: Trump sues Des Moines Register, Gannett over Iowa election poll
shortDescription: Trump's lawsuit against the Des Moines Register and its parent company, Gannett, is one of several the president-elect filed against news companies.
